title: Biden on Yemen Airstrikes: “Are They Stopping the Houthis? No. Are They Gonna Continue? Yes.”
description:
“Are the airstrikes in Yemen working?” It was a simple question, delivered directly to President Biden this afternoon.

The post Biden on Yemen Airstrikes: “Are They Stopping the Houthis? No. Are They Gonna Continue? Yes.” appeared first on The Intercept.

title: In Video From Gaza, Former CEO of Pegasus Spyware Firm Announces Millions for New Venture
description:
Dream Security has a raft of NSO Group vets at the helm — and deep ties to the Israeli and international right.

title: Families of People Killed by NYPD Brace for Eric Adams to Veto Criminal Justice Reform Bills
description:
Eric Adams publicly opposed City Council bills passed last month to beef up police accountability and ban solitary confinement.

The post Families of People Killed by NYPD Brace for Eric Adams to Veto Criminal Justice Reform Bills appeared first on The Intercept.
